description.value:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Your bonded partner gains the dying condition or their dying value would increase.

A lost love. A broken spear. Rage burning through a hero-god. When a myth speaks of a wounded partner, the hero-god often rejects the future. Too many find themselves on a battlefield, clutching a body that they swore to protect. In that moment, the wellspring of power ignites.

Increase the value of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed] condition by 1, to a maximum of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 3}. You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls against any creature that attacked or dealt damage to your partner in the last minute. If you reduce a creature to 0 HP that attacked or damaged your partner, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice their level. These benefits last until your bonded partner is no longer @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] or for 1 minute, whichever duration is shorter.
